entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI cannot decode records when reading from metadata #32196
  • GenAPI expands interface heirarchy #32195

Closed

  • Request, able to config the location of ~/.dotnet and ~/.templateengine #8678
    Backlog
  • GenAPI drops internal ctor which results in compilation errors #32119

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.0 to 19.14.1 in /eng/dependabot #32203
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32200
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32197
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #32194
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32193
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update branding to 7.0.205 #32181
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.301 #32182
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • #30336 Default Dotnet Tool to Run on Latest Runtime - Build time change #31957
    Review for breaking changes, untriaged, breaking-change, Area-Tools, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Update branding to 6.0.410 #32179
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.107 #32180
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.313 #32178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.118 #32177
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Move SelfContained=true from pack to SDK #32170
    Area-WasmSdk
  • Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix license headers in all source files #32141
    untriaged, Area-Compatibility
  • Make TryGetInternalDefaultConstructor work without internal metadata #32145
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Add debian to the SupportsTargetFramework logic. #32127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Try installing wasm-tool from a rollback file instead of from the feed #32107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable preview branch codeflow going forward #32161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.DiffPlex from 2.2.0 to 2.2.1 in /eng/dependabot #31984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Bump FakeItEasy from 7.3.1 to 7.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #31986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Bump FakeItEasy from 7.3.1 to 7.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #31987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32126
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • Don't generate publish deps.json for excluded packages #32106
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • An initial take at fixing the use of aliases.First() across the templating codebase #32144
    untriaged
  • 9500 dotnet tool install: Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade when specify version #31549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
